page.title: 16The Gainsborough Lady .
page.content: A vast range of drinks are sold at the Gainsbourgh Lady. Ale,beer,lager,guin- ness,spirits,cocktails and soft drinks Mr.Birch and 4 staff run it.A local lady cleans and Mr.Birch's sister from Greatford cooks the meals. Travellers need quickly heated meals like steak and kidney pie or seafood platter and chips.About 15 older regulars chat about village life,but most-pub goers are younger people aged 18-25 yrs. Mr.Birch has managed this pub for 9 years;before that it was called the Trollope Arms, as it was owned by the Trollope Bellew family.Lots of women nowadays are asking for slimline drinks.Vodka and orange juice is also popular.Men prefer beer and some drink non alchoholic beer so their driving is not affected.This pub is popular with cricketers.David Gower,Freddie Truman,and Mark James have visisted it
